me.brooks107.stfprocessor

Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.brooks107.stfprocessor.Utils

  • public class Utils
extends java.lang.Object
    Random methods (all static) that really should already be the the java packages but as they're not these are some basic implementations suitable for this project
    Author:
    Simeon Brooks (simeon26@gmail.com)

    • Field Summary

      private static int[] illegalChars
      Chars that aren't allowed in a Windows or UNIX filename

    • Method Detail

      • cleanFileName

        public static java.lang.String cleanFileName(java.lang.String badFileName)
        Cleans a string ready to be a windows or UNIX filename
        Parameters:
        badFileName - Input filename to be cleaned
        Returns:
        The filename ready to be used

      • countSubstringInString

        public static int countSubstringInString(java.lang.String searchString,
                                         java.lang.String mainString)
        Counts the number of occurrences of a string in another string. Really feel like this should be in the java.lang package but c'est la vie
        Parameters:
        searchString - String to search for
        mainString - String to search in
        Returns:
        The number of occurrences of searchString in mainString as an Integer.

      • intToString

        public static java.lang.String intToString(int value,
                                           int digits)
        Converts an int into a string with trailing zeros to match a given length. Another util method that I really thing should be in the standard Java classes (namely Integer) but hey ho.
        Parameters:
        value - The number to be represented as a String
        digits - The total number of digits, should always be as big as the number of digits in value
        Returns:
        A String representation of value that has String.length() = digits
